trans-unit.source: Provides a host for a single instance of a workflow.
trans-unit.target: 为工作流的单个实例提供主机。

trans-unit.source: The WorkflowApplication class provides a host for a single workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: WorkflowApplication 类为单个工作流实例提供主机。

trans-unit.source: It is a proxy to the actual workflow instance that is managed by the workflow runtime.
trans-unit.target: 它是由工作流运行时的实际的工作流实例的代理。

trans-unit.source: Users of WorkflowApplication can instruct the workflow runtime to perform actions on a workflow instance by calling the appropriate methods on a WorkflowApplication object.
trans-unit.target: WorkflowApplication 的用户可以指示工作流运行时，可以通过在 WorkflowApplication 对象上调用适当的方法对工作流实例执行操作。

trans-unit.source: If a requested action is not valid, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果请求的操作不是有效的则引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Using WorkflowApplication you can perform the following tasks: 1.
trans-unit.target: 使用 WorkflowApplication 可以执行以下任务︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: Create a new workflow instance, or load a workflow instance from an instance store.
trans-unit.target: 创建新的工作流实例，或从实例存储区加载工作流实例。

trans-unit.source: Provide extensions to be used by activities within a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 提供扩展以供工作流实例中的活动。

trans-unit.source: Control the execution of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 控制工作流实例的执行。

trans-unit.source: Resume a bookmark created by an activity within a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 恢复由工作流实例中的活动创建书签。

trans-unit.source: Persist or unload a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 保存或卸载工作流实例。

trans-unit.source: Be notified of workflow instance lifecycle events.
trans-unit.target: 工作流实例生命周期事件通知。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplication"></xref> class with the specified workflow definition.
trans-unit.target: 创建的新实例<xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplication"></xref>与指定的工作流定义的类。

trans-unit.target: 工作流定义中。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the workflow runtime that this workflow instance should abort.
trans-unit.target: 通知工作流运行时应中止此工作流实例。

trans-unit.source: When a workflow hosted by a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication> is aborted, the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Aborted%2A> handler is invoked and the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed%2A> handler is not invoked.
trans-unit.target: 承载的工作流<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication>中止时，<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Aborted%2A>调用处理程序和<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed%2A>不调用处理程序。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Aborted%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication>

trans-unit.source: Notifies the workflow runtime that this workflow instance should abort for the specified reason.
trans-unit.target: 通知特定原因应中止此工作流实例工作流运行时。

trans-unit.source: When a workflow hosted by a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication> is aborted, the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Aborted%2A> handler is invoked and the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed%2A> handler is not invoked.
trans-unit.target: 承载的工作流<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication>中止时，<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Aborted%2A>调用处理程序和<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed%2A>不调用处理程序。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Aborted%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication>

trans-unit.source: The reason for the request to abort.
trans-unit.target: 用于中止的请求原因。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Action%601> that is invoked when the workflow instance is aborted.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref:System.Action%601>中止工作流实例时调用。

trans-unit.source: When a workflow hosted by a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication> is aborted, the Aborted handler is invoked and the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed%2A> handler is not invoked.
trans-unit.target: 承载的工作流<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication>中止时，已中止调用处理程序和<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed%2A>不调用处理程序。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication>

trans-unit.source: The action that is invoked when the workflow instance is aborted.

trans-unit.target: 指定所含的新实例的首个保留的实例元数据值。

trans-unit.source: The metadata values to be included with the first persistence.
trans-unit.target: 要与首个保留包含元数据值。

trans-unit.source: Cancels a workflow instance asynchronously using the specified <xref:System.AsyncCallback> and user-provided state.
trans-unit.target: 取消使用以异步方式指定工作流实例<xref:System.AsyncCallback>和用户提供的状态。</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: To determine whether the cancel operation was successful, call <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndCancel%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定取消操作是否成功，请调用<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndCancel%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndCancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndCancel%2A> can be called from inside or outside of the `callback` method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndCancel%2A>可以从内部或外部调用`callback`方法。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndCancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndCancel%2A> is called before the cancel operation completes, it blocks until the cancel operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndCancel%2A>是取消操作完成前调用，被阻止，直至取消操作完成。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndCancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the cancel operation must complete in 30 seconds or a <xref:System.TimeoutException> is thrown from <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndCancel%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，取消操作必须在 30 秒或<xref:System.TimeoutException>从<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndCancel%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndCancel%2A>引发</xref:System.TimeoutException>中完成

trans-unit.source: This method cancels a workflow asynchronously using the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> asynchronous design pattern.
trans-unit.target: 此方法取消异步使用工作流<xref:System.IAsyncResult>异步设计模式。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)][Asynchronous Programming Overview](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=141764).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)][异步编程概述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=141764)。

trans-unit.source: The method to be called when the cancel operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 要取消操作完成时调用的方法。

trans-unit.target: 一个可选的应用程序特定对象，其中包含有关异步操作的信息。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the asynchronous cancel operation.
trans-unit.target: 对异步取消操作的引用。

trans-unit.source: Cancels a workflow instance asynchronously using the specified time-out interval, <xref:System.AsyncCallback>, and user-provided state.
trans-unit.target: 取消工作流实例使用指定的超时间隔以异步方式<xref:System.AsyncCallback>，和用户提供的状态。</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: To determine whether the cancel operation was successful, call <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndCancel%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定取消操作是否成功，请调用<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndCancel%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndCancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndCancel%2A> can be called from inside or outside of the method specified in the `callback` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndCancel%2A>可以在内部或外部中指定的方法调用从`callback`参数。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndCancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndCancel%2A> is called before the cancel operation completes, it blocks until the cancel operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndCancel%2A>是取消操作完成前调用，被阻止，直至取消操作完成。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndCancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the cancel operation does not complete in the interval specified by the `timeOut` parameter, a <xref:System.TimeoutException> is thrown from <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndCancel%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果取消操作未在指定的间隔内完成`timeOut`参数，<xref:System.TimeoutException>从<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndCancel%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndCancel%2A>引发</xref:System.TimeoutException>

trans-unit.source: A runnable instance is an instance for which a timer or instance lock has expired.
trans-unit.target: 可运行实例是为其计时器或实例锁已过期。

trans-unit.source: To determine if the load operation was successful, call <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndLoadRunnableInstance%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定加载操作是否成功，请调用<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndLoadRunnableInstance%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndLoadRunnableInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndLoadRunnableInstance%2A> can be called from inside or outside of the `callback` method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndLoadRunnableInstance%2A>可以从内部或外部调用`callback`方法。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndLoadRunnableInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndLoadRunnableInstance%2A> is called before the resume operation completes, it blocks until the resume operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndLoadRunnableInstance%2A>是调用恢复操作完成前，阻止，直至恢复操作完成。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndLoadRunnableInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the resume operation must complete in 30 seconds or else a <xref:System.TimeoutException> is thrown from <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndLoadRunnableInstance%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，恢复操作必须在 30 秒，否则无需<xref:System.TimeoutException>从<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndLoadRunnableInstance%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndLoadRunnableInstance%2A>引发</xref:System.TimeoutException>中完成

trans-unit.target: 若要确定加载操作是否成功，请调用<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndLoadRunnableInstance%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndLoadRunnableInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndLoadRunnableInstance%2A> can be called from inside or outside of the `callback` method.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndLoadRunnableInstance%2A> is called before the resume operation completes, it blocks until the resume operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndLoadRunnableInstance%2A>是调用恢复操作完成前，阻止，直至恢复操作完成。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndLoadRunnableInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: Persists a workflow instance to an instance store asynchronously using the specified callback method and user-provided state.
trans-unit.target: 将工作流实例保留到实例存储区使用指定的回调方法和用户提供的状态以异步方式。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether the persist operation was successful, call <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndPersist%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定保留操作是否成功，请调用<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndPersist%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndPersist%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndPersist%2A> can be called from inside or outside of the method referenced in the `callback` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndPersist%2A>可以在内部或外部中引用的方法调用从`callback`参数。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndPersist%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndPersist%2A> is called before the persist operation completes, it blocks until the persist operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndPersist%2A>是保留操作完成前调用，被阻止，直至保留操作完成。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndPersist%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the persist operation does not complete within 30 seconds, a <xref:System.TimeoutException> is thrown from <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndPersist%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果未在 30 秒，<xref:System.TimeoutException>从<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndPersist%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndPersist%2A>引发</xref:System.TimeoutException>内完成保留操作

trans-unit.source: If the workflow instance was previously loaded from persistence, then the same <xref:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceStore> used to load the workflow is used for persistence.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作流实例以前从持久性，则相同加载<xref:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceStore>用于加载工作流将用于保留结果。</xref:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceStore>

trans-unit.source: If the workflow was created and has not yet been persisted, then an <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.InstanceStore%2A> must be configured before calling this method or else an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作流已创建但未保留，则<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.InstanceStore%2A>必须在调用此方法之前配置或其他<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>调用此方法时引发。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.InstanceStore%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndResumeBookmark%2A> is called before the resume operation completes, it blocks until the resume operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndResumeBookmark%2A>是调用恢复操作完成前，阻止，直至恢复操作完成。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndResumeBookmark%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the resume operation does not complete within the specified time-out interval a <xref:System.TimeoutException> is thrown from <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndResumeBookmark%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果恢复操作不会完成在指定的超时间隔内<xref:System.TimeoutException>从<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndResumeBookmark%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndResumeBookmark%2A>引发</xref:System.TimeoutException>

trans-unit.source: This method resumes a bookmark asynchronously using the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> asynchronous design pattern.
trans-unit.target: 此方法恢复书签以异步方式使用<xref:System.IAsyncResult>异步设计模式。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)][Asynchronous Programming Overview](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=141764).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)][异步编程概述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=141764)。

trans-unit.source: The bookmark to resume.
trans-unit.target: 要恢复的书签。

trans-unit.source: An object passed as a parameter to the method that is invoked when the bookmark resumes.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象作为参数传递给书签恢复时所调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: The interval in which the resume operation must complete before the operation is canceled and a <xref:System.TimeoutException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 恢复操作必须在其间完成取消操作并的间隔<xref:System.TimeoutException>引发。</xref:System.TimeoutException>

trans-unit.source: The method to be called when the resume operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 要在恢复操作完成时调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: An optional application-specific object that contains information about the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 一个可选的应用程序特定对象，其中包含有关异步操作的信息。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the asynchronous bookmark resume operation.
trans-unit.target: 对异步书签恢复操作的引用。

trans-unit.source: Initiates an asynchronous operation to resume the bookmark with the specified name, using the specified value, time-out interval, callback method, and state.
trans-unit.target: 启动异步操作以恢复具有指定名称，使用指定的值、 超时间隔、 回调方法和状态的书签。

trans-unit.source: The bookmark to be resumed is previously created by an activity within the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 要恢复的书签是此前由工作流实例内的活动创建。

trans-unit.source: The bookmark result indicates whether the resumption operation succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 书签结果指示恢复操作是否成功。

trans-unit.source: The name of the bookmark to be resumed.
trans-unit.target: 要恢复的书签的名称。

trans-unit.source: An object passed as a parameter to the method that is invoked when the bookmark resumes.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象作为参数传递给书签恢复时所调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: The time interval during which the bookmark must be resumed.
trans-unit.target: 必须在此期间恢复书签的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: The method that is called when the asynchronous operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 异步操作完成时调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: The state of execution of a workflow that was saved by the calling thread before an asynchronous operation began.
trans-unit.target: 开始异步操作前调用线程保存工作流执行的状态。

trans-unit.source: The result of the bookmark resumption operation.
trans-unit.target: 书签恢复操作的结果。

trans-unit.source: Starts or resumes a workflow instance asynchronously using the specified callback method and user-provided state.
trans-unit.target: 启动或恢复工作流实例使用指定的回调方法和用户提供的状态以异步方式。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether the run operation was successful, call <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndRun%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定运行的操作是否成功，请调用<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndRun%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndRun%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndRun%2A> can be called from inside or outside of the method referenced in the `callback` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndRun%2A>可以在内部或外部中引用的方法调用从`callback`参数。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndRun%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndRun%2A> is called before the resume operation completes, it blocks until the resume operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndRun%2A>是调用恢复操作完成前，阻止，直至恢复操作完成。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndRun%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the resume operation must complete in 30 seconds or a <xref:System.TimeoutException> is thrown from <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndRun%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，恢复操作必须在 30 秒或<xref:System.TimeoutException>从<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndRun%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndRun%2A>引发</xref:System.TimeoutException>中完成

trans-unit.source: To be notified when the termination has completed, use the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnCompleted%2A> handle.
trans-unit.target: 若要得到通知在终止完成后，使用<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnCompleted%2A>处理。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnCompleted%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine whether the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.BeginTerminate%2A> operation was successful, call <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndTerminate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定是否<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.BeginTerminate%2A>操作成功，请调用<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndTerminate%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndTerminate%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.BeginTerminate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndTerminate%2A> can be called from inside or outside of the method reference in the `callback` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndTerminate%2A>可以在内部或外部中的方法引用调用从`callback`参数。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndTerminate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndTerminate%2A> is called before the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.BeginTerminate%2A> operation completes, it blocks until the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.BeginTerminate%2A> operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndTerminate%2A>之前调用<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.BeginTerminate%2A>操作完成后，它阻止，直至<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.BeginTerminate%2A>操作完成。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.BeginTerminate%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.BeginTerminate%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndTerminate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.BeginTerminate%2A> operation does not complete within the specified time-out interval a <xref:System.TimeoutException> is thrown from <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndTerminate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.BeginTerminate%2A>操作未完成在指定的超时间隔内<xref:System.TimeoutException>从<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndTerminate%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndTerminate%2A>引发</xref:System.TimeoutException></xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.BeginTerminate%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method terminates a workflow instance asynchronously using the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> asynchronous design pattern.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用终止工作流实例以异步方式<xref:System.IAsyncResult>异步设计模式。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)][Asynchronous Programming Overview](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=141764).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)][异步编程概述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=141764)。

trans-unit.source: The reason for terminating the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 终止工作流实例的原因。

trans-unit.source: The interval in which the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.BeginTerminate*> operation must complete before the operation is canceled and a <xref:System.TimeoutException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 在其中的间隔<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.BeginTerminate*>操作必须完成取消操作并<xref:System.TimeoutException>引发。</xref:System.TimeoutException> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.BeginTerminate*>

trans-unit.source: The method to be called when the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.BeginTerminate*> operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 该方法时要调用<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.BeginTerminate*>操作已完成。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.BeginTerminate*>

trans-unit.source: An optional application-specific object that contains information about the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 一个可选的应用程序特定对象，其中包含有关异步操作的信息。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the asynchronous <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.BeginTerminate*> operation.
trans-unit.target: 对异步引用<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.BeginTerminate*>操作。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.BeginTerminate*>

trans-unit.source: Persists and disposes a workflow instance asynchronously using the specified callback method and user-provided state.
trans-unit.target: 保留和释放工作流实例使用指定的回调方法和用户提供的状态以异步方式。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.BeginUnload%2A> operation was successful, call <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndUnload%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定是否<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.BeginUnload%2A>操作成功，请调用<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndUnload%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndUnload%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.BeginUnload%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndUnload%2A> can be called from inside or outside of the method reference in the `callback` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndUnload%2A>可以在内部或外部中的方法引用调用从`callback`参数。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndUnload%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndUnload%2A> is called before the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.BeginUnload%2A> operation completes, it blocks until the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.BeginUnload%2A> operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndUnload%2A>之前调用<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.BeginUnload%2A>操作完成后，它阻止，直至<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.BeginUnload%2A>操作完成。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.BeginUnload%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.BeginUnload%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndUnload%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.BeginUnload%2A> operation must complete in 30 seconds or a <xref:System.TimeoutException> is thrown from <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndUnload%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.BeginUnload%2A>操作必须在 30 秒或<xref:System.TimeoutException>从<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndUnload%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.EndUnload%2A>引发</xref:System.TimeoutException>中完成</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.BeginUnload%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the workflow instance was previously loaded from persistence, then the same <xref:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceStore> used to load the workflow is used for persistence.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作流实例以前从持久性，则相同加载<xref:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceStore>用于加载工作流将用于保留结果。</xref:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceStore>

trans-unit.source: If the workflow was created and has not yet been persisted, then an <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.InstanceStore%2A> must be configured before calling this method or else an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作流已创建但未保留，则<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.InstanceStore%2A>必须在调用此方法之前配置或其他<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>调用此方法时引发。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.InstanceStore%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method persists and disposes a workflow instance asynchronously using the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> asynchronous design pattern.
trans-unit.target: 此方法保留和释放工作流实例以异步方式使用<xref:System.IAsyncResult>异步设计模式。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Func%602> that is invoked when the current workflow instance encounters an unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref:System.Func%602>当前的工作流实例遇到未经处理的异常时调用。

trans-unit.source: Both OnUnhandledException and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowUnhandledExceptionBehavior> dictate the behavior of the runtime when an exception is not handled in the workflow; however, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowUnhandledExceptionBehavior> has the option of leaving a suspended workflow in the persistence store, while OnUnhandledException does not.
trans-unit.target: 这两个工作和<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowUnhandledExceptionBehavior>都运行时的行为将指示工作流; 中未处理异常时但是，<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowUnhandledExceptionBehavior>具有将挂起的工作流保留在持久性存储中，而工作不选项。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowUnhandledExceptionBehavior> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowUnhandledExceptionBehavior>

trans-unit.source: The reason for this is that what happens to a suspended workflow is host-specific, and <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication> is not.
trans-unit.target: 这样做的原因是，挂起的工作流会发生什么情况是特定于宿主的和<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication>不是。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication>

trans-unit.source: To implement this functionality using <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication>, create a custom <xref:System.Activities.Persistence.PersistenceParticipant> that has this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 若要实现此功能使用<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication>，创建自定义<xref:System.Activities.Persistence.PersistenceParticipant>具有此行为。</xref:System.Activities.Persistence.PersistenceParticipant> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication>

trans-unit.source: The delegate that is invoked when a workflow instance encounters an unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: 用于工作流实例遇到未经处理的异常时调用的委托。

trans-unit.source: Persists a workflow instance to an instance store.
trans-unit.target: 将工作流实例保留到实例存储区。

trans-unit.source: If the persist operation does not complete within 30 seconds, a <xref:System.TimeoutException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果未在 30 秒内完成保留操作<xref:System.TimeoutException>引发。</xref:System.TimeoutException>

trans-unit.source: If the workflow instance was previously loaded from persistence, then the same <xref:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceStore> used to load the workflow is used for persistence.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作流实例以前从持久性，则相同加载<xref:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceStore>用于加载工作流将用于保留结果。</xref:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceStore>

trans-unit.source: If the workflow was created and has not yet been persisted, then an <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.InstanceStore%2A> must be configured before calling this method or else an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作流已创建但未保留，则<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.InstanceStore%2A>必须在调用此方法之前配置或其他<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>调用此方法时引发。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.InstanceStore%2A>

trans-unit.source: Persists a workflow instance to an instance store using the specified time-out interval.
trans-unit.target: 将工作流实例保留到实例存储区中使用指定的超时间隔。

trans-unit.source: If the workflow instance was previously loaded from persistence, then the same <xref:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceStore> used to load the workflow is used for persistence.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作流实例以前从持久性，则相同加载<xref:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceStore>用于加载工作流将用于保留结果。</xref:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceStore>

trans-unit.source: If the workflow was created and has not yet been persisted, then an <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.InstanceStore%2A> must be configured before calling this method or else an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作流已创建但未保留，则<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.InstanceStore%2A>必须在调用此方法之前配置或其他<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>调用此方法时引发。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.InstanceStore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The interval in which the persist operation must complete before the operation is canceled and a <xref:System.TimeoutException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 保留操作必须在其间完成取消操作并的间隔<xref:System.TimeoutException>引发。</xref:System.TimeoutException>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Activities.ActivityFunc> that is invoked when the current workflow instance is idle and can be persisted.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref:System.Activities.ActivityFunc>当前的工作流实例处于空闲状态，并可被保留时调用。</xref:System.Activities.ActivityFunc>

trans-unit.source: When a workflow becomes idle and can be persisted, both <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A> and PersistableIdle are invoked, in that order.
trans-unit.target: 当工作流进入空闲状态，并可被保留，同时<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A>和调用 PersistableIdle，按此顺序。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The PersistableIdle handler returns one of the <xref:System.Activities.PersistableIdleAction> enumeration values of <xref:System.Activities.PersistableIdleAction>, <xref:System.Activities.PersistableIdleAction>, or <xref:System.Activities.PersistableIdleAction>.
trans-unit.target: PersistableIdle 处理程序返回的一个<xref:System.Activities.PersistableIdleAction>枚举值<xref:System.Activities.PersistableIdleAction>， <xref:System.Activities.PersistableIdleAction>，或<xref:System.Activities.PersistableIdleAction>。</xref:System.Activities.PersistableIdleAction> </xref:System.Activities.PersistableIdleAction> </xref:System.Activities.PersistableIdleAction> </xref:System.Activities.PersistableIdleAction>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.ActivityFunc> that is invoked when the current workflow instance is idle and can be persisted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.ActivityFunc>当前的工作流实例处于空闲状态，并可被保留时调用。</xref:System.Activities.ActivityFunc>

trans-unit.source: Initiates an operation to resume the specified bookmark, using the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 启动操作以恢复指定的书签，使用指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The bookmark to be resumed is previously created by an activity within the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 要恢复的书签是此前由工作流实例内的活动创建。

trans-unit.source: The bookmark result indicates whether the resumption operation succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 书签结果指示恢复操作是否成功。

trans-unit.source: The bookmark to resume.
trans-unit.target: 要恢复的书签。

trans-unit.source: An object passed as a parameter to the method that is invoked when the bookmark resumes.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象作为参数传递给书签恢复时所调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: The result of the bookmark resumption operation.
trans-unit.target: 书签恢复操作的结果。

trans-unit.source: Initiates an operation to resume the bookmark with the specified name, using the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 启动操作以恢复具有指定名称，使用指定的值的书签。

trans-unit.source: The bookmark to be resumed is previously created by an activity within the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 要恢复的书签是此前由工作流实例内的活动创建。

trans-unit.source: The bookmark result indicates whether the resumption operation succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 书签结果指示恢复操作是否成功。

trans-unit.source: The name of the bookmark to be resumed.
trans-unit.target: 要恢复的书签的名称。

trans-unit.source: An object passed as a parameter to the method that is invoked when the bookmark resumes.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象作为参数传递给书签恢复时所调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: The result of the bookmark resumption operation.
trans-unit.target: 书签恢复操作的结果。

trans-unit.source: Initiates an operation to resume the specified bookmark, using the specified value and time-out interval.
trans-unit.target: 启动操作以恢复指定的书签，使用指定的值和超时间隔。

trans-unit.source: The bookmark to be resumed is previously created by an activity within the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 要恢复的书签是此前由工作流实例内的活动创建。

trans-unit.source: The bookmark result indicates whether the resumption operation succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 书签结果指示恢复操作是否成功。

trans-unit.source: The bookmark to resume.
trans-unit.target: 要恢复的书签。

trans-unit.source: An object passed as a parameter to the method that is invoked when the bookmark resumes.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象作为参数传递给书签恢复时所调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: The time interval during which the bookmark must be resumed.
trans-unit.target: 必须在此期间恢复书签的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: The result of the bookmark resumption operation.
trans-unit.target: 书签恢复操作的结果。

trans-unit.source: Initiates an operation to resume the bookmark with the specified name, using the specified value and time-out interval.
trans-unit.target: 启动操作以恢复具有指定名称，使用指定的值和超时间隔的书签。

trans-unit.source: The bookmark to be resumed is previously created by an activity within the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 要恢复的书签是此前由工作流实例内的活动创建。

trans-unit.source: The bookmark result indicates whether the resumption operation succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 书签结果指示恢复操作是否成功。

trans-unit.source: The name of the bookmark to be resumed.
trans-unit.target: 要恢复的书签的名称。

trans-unit.source: An object passed as a parameter to the method that is invoked when the bookmark resumes.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象作为参数传递给书签恢复时所调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: The time interval during which the bookmark must be resumed.
trans-unit.target: 必须在此期间恢复书签的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: The result of the bookmark resumption operation.
trans-unit.target: 书签恢复操作的结果。

trans-unit.source: Begins or resumes the execution of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 开始或恢复工作流实例的执行。

trans-unit.source: Call this method to initiate execution of a newly created workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法以开始执行新创建的工作流实例。

trans-unit.source: If the run operation does not complete within 30 seconds, a <xref:System.TimeoutException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果运行的操作未在 30 秒内完成<xref:System.TimeoutException>引发。</xref:System.TimeoutException>

trans-unit.source: Begins or resumes the execution of a workflow instance using the specified time-out interval.
trans-unit.target: 开始或恢复工作流实例使用指定的超时间隔执行。

trans-unit.source: Note that unlike <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowInvoker.Invoke%2A>, this method will time out only if the workflow doesn't start in the specified amount of time, rather than needing to complete in the specified amount of time.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，与不同<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowInvoker.Invoke%2A>，此方法会超时，仅当工作流不能启动在指定的时间量，而无需在指定的时间内完成。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowInvoker.Invoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: The reason for this is that <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowInvoker.Invoke%2A> executes the workflow synchronously (blocking the host thread), while Run executes asynchronously, only blocking the host thread for the amount of time it takes the workflow to start.
trans-unit.target: 这样做的原因在于<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowInvoker.Invoke%2A>以同步方式执行工作流 （阻止宿主线程），运行以异步方式执行仅阻止宿主线程时间的同时，它采用启动工作流。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowInvoker.Invoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call this method to initiate execution of a newly created workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法以开始执行新创建的工作流实例。

trans-unit.source: The interval in which the run operation must complete before the operation is canceled and a <xref:System.TimeoutException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 运行的操作必须在其间完成取消操作并的间隔<xref:System.TimeoutException>引发。</xref:System.TimeoutException>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Terminates a workflow instance using the specified exception.
trans-unit.target: 终止工作流实例使用指定的异常。

trans-unit.source: This method schedules the termination of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会安排对工作流实例终止。

trans-unit.source: To be notified when the termination has completed, use the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnCompleted%2A> handle.
trans-unit.target: 若要得到通知在终止完成后，使用<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnCompleted%2A>处理。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnCompleted%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the Terminate operation must complete in 30 seconds or a <xref:System.TimeoutException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，终止操作必须完成在 30 秒内或<xref:System.TimeoutException>引发。</xref:System.TimeoutException>

trans-unit.source: The reason for terminating the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 终止工作流实例的原因。

trans-unit.source: Terminates a workflow instance using the specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 终止工作流实例使用指定的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: This method schedules the termination of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会安排对工作流实例终止。

trans-unit.source: To be notified when the termination has completed, use the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnCompleted%2A> handle.
trans-unit.target: 若要得到通知在终止完成后，使用<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnCompleted%2A>处理。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnCompleted%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the Terminate operation must complete in 30 seconds or a <xref:System.TimeoutException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，终止操作必须完成在 30 秒内或<xref:System.TimeoutException>引发。</xref:System.TimeoutException>

trans-unit.source: The reason for terminating the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 终止工作流实例的原因。

trans-unit.source: Terminates a workflow instance using the specified exception and time-out interval.
trans-unit.target: 终止工作流实例使用指定的异常和超时间隔。

trans-unit.source: This method schedules the termination of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会安排工作流终止。

trans-unit.source: To be notified when the termination has completed, use the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnCompleted%2A> handle.
trans-unit.target: 若要得到通知在终止完成后，使用<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnCompleted%2A>处理。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnCompleted%2A>

trans-unit.source: The reason for terminating the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 终止工作流实例的原因。

trans-unit.source: The interval in which the Terminate operation must complete before the operation is canceled and a <xref:System.TimeoutException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 将取消该操作并，终止操作必须完成的时间间隔<xref:System.TimeoutException>引发。</xref:System.TimeoutException>

trans-unit.source: Terminates a workflow instance using the specified error message and time-out interval.
trans-unit.target: 终止工作流实例使用指定的错误消息和超时间隔。

trans-unit.source: This method schedules the termination of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会安排对工作流实例终止。

trans-unit.source: To be notified when the termination has completed, use the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnCompleted%2A> handle.
trans-unit.target: 若要得到通知在终止完成后，使用<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnCompleted%2A>处理。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnCompleted%2A>

trans-unit.source: The reason for terminating the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 终止工作流实例的原因。

trans-unit.source: The interval in which the Terminate operation must complete before the operation is canceled and a <xref:System.TimeoutException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 将取消该操作并，终止操作必须完成的时间间隔<xref:System.TimeoutException>引发。</xref:System.TimeoutException>

trans-unit.source: Persists and unloads a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 保留和卸载工作流实例。

trans-unit.source: By default, the unload operation must complete in 30 seconds or a <xref:System.TimeoutException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，卸载操作必须完成在 30 秒内或<xref:System.TimeoutException>引发。</xref:System.TimeoutException>

trans-unit.source: If the workflow instance was previously loaded from persistence, then the same <xref:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceStore> used to load the workflow is used for persistence.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作流实例以前从持久性，则相同加载<xref:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceStore>用于加载工作流将用于保留结果。</xref:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceStore>

trans-unit.source: If the workflow was created and has not yet been persisted, then an <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.InstanceStore%2A> must be configured before calling this method or else an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作流已创建但未保留，则<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.InstanceStore%2A>必须在调用此方法之前配置或其他<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>调用此方法时引发。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.InstanceStore%2A>

trans-unit.source: Persists and unloads a workflow instance using the specified time-out interval.
trans-unit.target: 保留和卸载工作流实例使用指定的超时间隔。

trans-unit.source: If the workflow instance was previously loaded from persistence, then the same <xref:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceStore> used to load the workflow is used for persistence.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作流实例以前从持久性，则相同加载<xref:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceStore>用于加载工作流将用于保留结果。</xref:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceStore>

trans-unit.source: If the workflow was created and has not yet been persisted, then an <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.InstanceStore%2A> must be configured before calling this method or else an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作流已创建但未保留，则<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.InstanceStore%2A>必须在调用此方法之前配置或其他<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>调用此方法时引发。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.InstanceStore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The interval in which the unload operation must complete before the operation is canceled and a <xref:System.TimeoutException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 卸载操作必须在其间完成取消操作并的间隔<xref:System.TimeoutException>引发。</xref:System.TimeoutException>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Action%601> that is invoked when the current workflow unloads.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref:System.Action%601>卸载当前工作流时调用。

trans-unit.source: An action that is invoked when a workflow instance is unloaded.
trans-unit.target: 卸载工作流实例时调用的操作。
